markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fey Cantrips](/Feats.aspx?ID=2633) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sprite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=238" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 130 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

You've learned the cantrips sprites have used since time immemorial. You gain [_dancing lights_](/Spells.aspx?ID=58) and [_ghost sound_](/Spells.aspx?ID=132) as primal innate cantrips. If you have the grig heritage, you also gain [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), and if you have the draxie heritage, you gain [_prestidigitation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=229).
name: Fey Cantrips

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Fey Cantrips Source Ancestry Guide pg. 130 3.0 --- You've learned the cantrips sprites have used since time immemorial. You gain dancing lights and ghost sound as primal innate cantrips. If you have the grig heritage, you also gain detect magic , and if you have the draxie heritage, you gain prestidigitation .
